text:
Different applications and operations departments have different restrictions on
where log files must go.  The attached patch makes catalina.sh's redirection of
stdout and stderr more flexible in this regarding.  catalina.bat did not seem to
require a similar modification.

* catalina/src/bin/catalina.sh
  CATALINA_OUT: (Optional) Location of the file to which stdout and stderr
  are written.  Defaults to $CATALINA_BASE/logs/catalina.out.

  Used CATALINA_OUT in addition to or in place of
  $CATALINA_BASE/logs/catalina.out throughout the script.
